thread.title: BRIEF-Intelsat Announces First Quarter Loss Of $0.56 Per Share

title: BRIEF-Intelsat Announces First Quarter Loss Of $0.56 Per Share
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:16 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Intelsat Announces First Quarter Loss Of $0.56 Per Share Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Intelsat SA: * QTRLY REVENUE $543.8 MILLION VERSUS $538.5 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.40, REVENUE VIEW $520.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REAFFIRMED ITS 2018 REVENUE, ADJUSTED EBITDA AND CAPITAL EXPENDITURE GUIDANCE
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $2.08 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2019 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE $425 MILLION TO $500 MILLION
* SEES 2020 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE $375 MILLION TO $475 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.40, REVENUE VIEW $520.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
